summary: The young dentist Chesnokov has a knack for painlessly removing teeth, much to the dismay of other dentists, who fear unemployment and start to challenge Chesnokov.
cast: Andrey Myagkov|Vera Vasileva|Alisa Freyndlikh|Panteleymon Krymov|Andrei Petrov|Yevgeny Perov|Olga Gobzeva|Igor Kvasha|Valentin Nikulin|Leonid Dyachkov|Elizaveta Nikishchikhina|Antonina Maksimova|Pavel Pankov|Anatoli Shalyapin|Viktor Koltsov|Elena Millioti
title: Pokhozhdeniya zubnogo vracha
